person.name: Twin Gates
person.topic: Yes, Vesper is a fair village.Hast thou come a long way?We are honored by the visit of one on the quest!We are honored by the visit of one on the quest!

person.name: Guard
person.topic: Me tough!Ug, thee tough?Ug, thee tough!Ug, me tough!

person.name: Servile
person.topic: I know of the skull of Mondain the Wizard!Hast thou heard of it?It is an evil artifact!It is an evil artifact!
To use it for any reason is a sign of great evil, and no virtue!

person.name: Traveling Dan
person.description: Short rotund man with a hat and vest.
person.topic: I am here to repair goods at the guild shop.Been to the guild shop?Great selection!Best prices!
I know the world is round!

person.name: Balthasar
person.topic: Serfs work hard for little pay!
I work the fields for my master!Dost thou have a master?I hope he or she is a kind one!Thou art lucky indeed!

person.name: Plain
person.topic: When the 3 principles of virtue combine in eight ways pride has no virtue!
To be proud is not a virtue, and so Magincia was destroyed! Humility is the virtue that remains!

person.name: Simple
person.topic: The shrine lies on the north bank of the isle of the abyss and is guarded by endless hoards of daemons!Know the isle?Good.Southeast of Britannia!

person.name: Gem
person.topic: I can help thee with the mantra!
Since humility is the opposite of pride, so is its mantra!Know ye the mantra of pride?Then reverse it for humility!When thou dost, reverse it!

person.name: Joseph
person.topic: I am but a humble shepherd.
I am on a pilgrimage unto the shrine of humility!Did thou know that there is no shrine of pride?Very good.Pride is not a virtue of the avatar!
It is on the dark island!

person.name: Friday
person.topic: I shall warn thee against taking this gold!Dost thou intend to take it?That would not reflect well upon thy virtues!That is good.

person.name: Randal
person.topic: One >must< visit each shrine for 1, 2 & 3 cycles each for thy paths to be clear!Dost thou visit them often?Very good.Make that the first goal along thy path to avatarhood!

person.name: Dirgen
person.topic: Strive ye to know and develop the virtue within thee.
The Seer Hawkwind should be consulted >often< for he can see within thee!Dost thou?Good!Thou shalt surely stray from the path!

person.name: Shazbot
person.topic: Thou thinks I'm funny!Don't thou?Well good, I try to be!Ah, too bad, I thought I was.
I dare thee to ask me about Nate the snake!
Well, it's a long story and we haven't the time.

person.name: Flatbush
person.topic: He lives in Yew!Hast thou been to Yew?Calumny knows the quickness spell!Calumny knows the quickness spell! Seek him out!

person.name: Corkrin
person.topic: I travel these fair lands to spread the virtues!
To know thy progress on the paths of virtue one >must< visit the Seer Hawkwind often!Dost thou do this?Good.Thou must or thou may stray!

person.name: Dyka
person.topic: I am a thief, I like to borrow!
My favorite things to borrow are horses!
You can steal horses in the towne Paws!Art thou a thief?Watch out for the bull in the corral!Likely, thou art a wimp!
